directions: Place nutritional yeast on a plate. Mix in garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Roll tofu slices in the nutritional yeast mixture until evenly coated.
Heat oil in a nonstick skillet over low to medium heat. Add tofu slices; cook until golden brown and crispy, 3 to 5 minutes per side.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package water-packed firm tofu, drained and rinsed
½ teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste  (Optional)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Pan-Fried Tofu
